extension.author: Sopan Technologies

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Load jQuery?
field.description: Enable this only if your Joomla site template does not include jQuery already.

field.name: strip_html
field.label: Remove HTML?
field.description: Remove HTML tags from testimonial text?

field.name: text_limit
field.label: Testimonial Limit (in words)
field.description: Limit testimonial text by specifying number of words to be shown in module. 0 means no limit.

field.name: display_rating
field.label: Display Rating?
field.description: Would you like to display testimonial rating?

field.name: display_image
field.label: Display Author Image?
field.description: Would you like to display testimonial author image, if exists?

field.name: display_author_creds
field.label: Display Author Credentials?
field.description: Would you like to display testimonial author credentials, if exists?

field.name: display_url
field.label: Display Author URL?
field.description: Would you like to display testimonial author URL, if exists?

field.name: display_date
field.label: Display Testimonial Date?
field.description: Would you like to display testimonial date?

field.name: link_url
field.label: Link URL with Author Name?
field.description: Would you like to link the URL with author name instead of showing it separately? Note that this works irrespective of whether you have set display URL to Yes or No.

field.name: accent
field.label: Quote Accent Color
field.description: Accent color for the testimonial block quotes

field.name: responsive
field.label: Responsive Slider?
field.description: Enable or disable auto resize of the slider. Useful if you need to use fixed width sliders.

field.name: touchEnabled
field.label: Touch Enabled?
field.description: If yes, slider will allow touch swipe transitions

field.label: Mode
field.name: mode
field.description: Type of transition between slides

field.name: speed
field.label: Speed
field.description: Slide transition duration (in ms)

field.name: slideMargin
field.label: Slide Margin
field.description: Margin between each slide

field.name: startSlide
field.label: Starting Slide
field.description: Starting slide index (zero-based)

field.name: randomStart
field.label: Randomize?
field.description: Start slider on a random slide

field.name: infiniteLoop
field.label: Infine Loop?
field.description: If yes, clicking 'Next' while on the last slide will transition to the first slide and vice-versa

field.name: adaptiveHeight
field.label: Adaptive Height?
field.description: Dynamically adjust slider height based on each slide's height

field.name: pager
field.label: Show Pagination?
field.description: If yes, a pager will be added

field.label: Pagination Type
field.name: pagerType
field.description: If 'full', a pager link will be generated for each slide. If 'short', a x / y pager will be used (ex. 1 / 5)

field.name: pagerShortSeparator
field.label: Pagination Separator
field.description: If pagination type is set to 'short', pager will use this value as the separating character

field.name: controls
field.label: Show Controls?
field.description: If yes, 'Next' / 'Prev' controls will be added

field.name: auto
field.label: Auto Start?
field.description: Slides will automatically transition

field.name: pause
field.label: Pause between Auto-Transition
field.description: The amount of time (in ms) between each auto transition

field.name: minSlides
field.label: Minimum no. of Testimonials
field.description: The minimum number of testimonials to be shown. Testimonials will be sized down if carousel becomes smaller than the original size.

field.name: maxSlides
field.label: Maximum no. of Testimonials
field.description: The maximum number of testimonials to be shown. Testimonials will be sized up if carousel becomes larger than the original size.

field.name: moveSlides
field.label: No. of Testimonials to be Moved
field.description: The number of testimonials to move on transition. This value must be more than no. of minimum testimonials, and less than no. of maximum testimonials. If zero (default), the number of fully-visible slides will be used.

field.name: slideWidth
field.label: Slider Width
field.description: The width of each testimonial. This setting is required for all horizontal carousels! This must be set for showing more than one testimonial in the slider.

field.name: swnote
field.description: Note that slider width must be set to greater than zero, i.e. 300, if you want to show more than one testimonial at once.
